title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 - Sibiu, Romania
description:
Imagine a group of people gathering in a room and coding all day. Just for fun.  
More information about code retreat can be found here (http://agileworks.ro/code-retreat/) 
To help us in organizing the event, those willing to participate, please confirm at https://www.facebook.com/events/857575417689098/  
The structure for the event will be according with: 
http://archive.coderetreat.org/facilitating/structure-of-a-coderetreat
